install.name: System - SimpleDownload Link Creator
install.author: Joel Rowley
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Joel Rowley. All rights reserved.
install.description: This plugin will search for tags on the website in the format of {simpledownload href=filePath}Text-To-Be-Displayed{/simpledownload} and replace them with the appropriate link to the com_simpledownload component to force that file to be downloaded.

param.name: useCustomOutput
param.label: Use Custom Output
param.description: Enable to indicate to the plugin to use a global custom output.

param.name: customOutputPattern
param.label: Custom Output Pattern
param.description:
Enter the pattern for the custom output. Key tags are:

  • {filepath} - The full path for the download link.
  • {title} - Title to be displayed
  • {fileid} - The path to the file or the encrypted path to the file.
